What standards [@ara√∫jo2019; @kass2023; @zurell2020] are required for models to be hosted?

-   input

    -   input observations

    -   environmental predictors\
        and range of values in original observations

-   outputs

    -   measure(s) of uncertainty\
        standard error, standard deviation (`sd`), confidence intervals (e.g., 5% and 95%), coefficient of variation (cv)...
